Scientific Publication Theme for ggplot2

theme_publication.Rd

Creates a ggplot2 theme optimized for scientific publications with high resolution, clear fonts, and professional appearance suitable for journal submissions.

theme_publication(
  base_size = 12,
  base_family = "Arial",
  base_line_size = 0.5,
  base_rect_size = 0.5,
  legend_position = c("right", "left", "top", "bottom", "none"),
  aspect_ratio = NULL,
  panel_border = TRUE,
  background_color = "white",
  panel_background_color = "white"
)

Arguments

base_size

Numeric, base font size in points (default: 12)

base_family

Character, font family (default: "Arial")

base_line_size

Numeric, base line size (default: 0.5)

base_rect_size

Numeric, base rectangle size (default: 0.5)

legend_position

Character, legend position (default: "right")

aspect_ratio

Numeric, aspect ratio (width/height), NULL for auto (default: NULL)

panel_border

Logical, whether to add panel border (default: TRUE)

background_color

Character, background color (default: "white")

panel_background_color

Character, panel background color (default: "white")

Value

A ggplot2 theme object

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(ggplot2)

# Basic usage
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_publication()

# Custom settings
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_publication(
    base_size = 10,
    base_family = "Times New Roman",
    legend_position = "bottom"
  )
} # }
